subject: Verify Your Account
snippet: Your account has been compromised. Please login immediately to rectify this. www.amazon.com/login-page

subject: Lunch Tomorrow?
snippet: Hey, are we still on for lunch tomorrow?

subject: Payment Received
snippet: You have received $200. Open your app and check you balance for details on the transaction.

subject: Updated Benefits Information
snippet: Please review the updated benefits package for this year.

subject: Account Suspended
snippet: We detected unusual activity. Please login to restore access before your acccount is suspended.

subject: Meeting Notes
snippet: Attached are the notes from today's meeting.

subject: Suspicious Login Attempt
snippet: We noticed a login attempt from an unknown device. Please verify.

subject: Project Update
snippet: Here is the latest update on the project deliverables.

subject: Confirm Your Transaction
snippet: A transaction was flagged. Click here to confirm or deny it.

subject: Vacation Photos
snippet: Check out the photos from our recent trip!

subject: File Share Request
snippet: Someone has shared a file with you. Click here to access.

subject: You won a phone!
snippet:
Thank you for being a valued costumer of Apple. You have the opertunity to recieve a new phone for your support! 
 Please check the attatchment for any question on how to finish you application for the prize.

subject: Happy Birthday!
snippet: Wishing you a wonderful birthday. Let's celebrate soon!

subject: Tax Payment Required
snippet: Your taxes are overdue. Pay immediately to avoid penalties.

subject: Monthly Newsletter
snippet: Check out the latest news and updates from our company.

subject: Delivery Issue
snippet: Your package delivery could not be completed. Click to resolve.

subject: Requestion up to date information
snippet:
We have been having issues with our data in the employee acccounts. 
Please get back yo us with your updated address for the year so that we may have the correct info going foward..
